overview: Far Far Est is a proud Québecois short film about Charles and Olivier's love for skiing and surfing on the North-American East coast. While they might not be dropping into the craziest ski lines you will see this year, the two explorers make sure to turn this trip into a real-life fairy tale.
tagline: Instead of doing what most student populations do on a March break, Charles and Olivier had other plans.
title: Far Far Est
